name: Data release 001
text: All sampling event (meta)data for the first ARMS-MBON dataset submitted to EurOBIS (2018-2020)

name: Analysis release 001
text: The bioinformatics in/output data from the analysis of the first ARMS-MBON dataset submitted to EurOBIS (2018-2020)

name: Code release 001
text: The codes used to analyse the species outputs from the bioinformatics done for the first ARMS-MBON dataset submitted to EurOBIS (2018-2020)

name: Quality controlled data
text: The quality-controlled ARMS-MBON metadata for all events to the current date, being the first port-of-call for the general user of ARMS-MBON data

name: Data Workspace
text: Repository where (meta)data are harvested and then quality controlled, semantically annotated, and combined. Sampling and sequence metadata, omics processing results, and image metadata are included here

name: Documentation
text: ARMS-MBON documentation and templates for labels, observations, and image spreadsheets

name: Darwin Core Generator
text: Scripts to turn our PEMA outputs and metadata into DcW files destined for EurOBIS
